greeting.speaker: Fire Chief
greeting.text: Thank goodness you're here! We have multiple emergency situations that need immediate attention.

choices.text: Are there any survivors that need rescue?
What supplies do we need?
I'm ready to help. What should I do first?

survivor_info.speaker: Fire Chief
survivor_info.text: Yes, we have reports of survivors trapped in the collapsed section of Building A. They need immediate rescue.

choices.text: I'll head there right away.
Tell me more about the situation.

supply_info.speaker: Fire Chief
supply_info.text: Our medical supplies are running dangerously low. We need bandages, morphine, and other medical equipment from the supply depot.

choices.text: I can handle the supply run.
Let me think about other options first.

assign_first_mission.speaker: Fire Chief
assign_first_mission.text: The most urgent task is rescuing the trapped survivors. Every second counts!

choices.text: Understood. I'm on it!

mission_accepted.speaker: Fire Chief
mission_accepted.text: Good luck out there. Radio in if you need backup. Lives depend on you!

choices.text: Roger that, Chief.

supply_mission_accepted.speaker: Fire Chief
supply_mission_accepted.text: The supply depot is two blocks north. Be careful, some areas are still unstable.

choices.text: I'll be careful. See you soon.

detailed_briefing.speaker: Fire Chief
detailed_briefing.text: The building collapsed during the earthquake. We have thermal readings showing at least one person in the basement level. The main stairway is blocked.

choices.text: I understand. I'll find another way in.
What equipment should I bring?

equipment_advice.speaker: Fire Chief
equipment_advice.text: Take the cutting torch, rope, and a medical kit. You'll need them to clear debris and treat any injuries.

choices.text: Got it. I'm ready to go.

congratulations.speaker: Fire Chief
congratulations.text: Outstanding work! You've saved lives today. The survivor is being treated and will make a full recovery.

choices.text: Just doing my job, Chief.
How is the survivor doing?

next_mission_offer.speaker: Fire Chief
next_mission_offer.text: Well, if you're up for it, we still need those medical supplies. Think you can handle another mission?

choices.text: Absolutely. Point me in the right direction.
I need to take a short break first.

survivor_update.speaker: Fire Chief
survivor_update.text: She's stable. Broken leg and some cuts, but she'll be fine thanks to your quick thinking.

choices.text: I'm glad she's okay.

break_acknowledged.speaker: Fire Chief
break_acknowledged.text: Of course. Take all the time you need. Come find me when you're ready for the next assignment.

choices.text: Will do, Chief.

urgent_request.speaker: Medical Officer
urgent_request.text: We're running critically low on medical supplies! Can you help us restock?

choices.text: What do you need?
I'm handling another emergency right now.

supply_list.speaker: Medical Officer
supply_list.text: We need bandages, morphine, and antiseptic. The supply depot should have everything we need.

choices.text: I'll get those supplies for you.

understanding.speaker: Medical Officer
understanding.text: I understand. Every emergency is critical. Come back when you can - we'll still need those supplies.

choices.text: I'll be back as soon as I can.

grateful.speaker: Medical Officer
grateful.text: Thank you so much! Time is of the essence - patients are depending on these supplies.

choices.text: I'm on my way.
